config.qs_SellKey_tooltip: Which key(s) to use to send items to the Shipping Bin.
config.qs_CheckIfItemsCanBeShipped_name: Check if items can be shipped
config.qs_CheckIfItemsCanBeShipped_toolt: Prevent sending non-shippable items to the Shipping Bin.
config.qs_EnableHUDMessages_tooltip: Show HUD notifications, for example, every time an item is shipped.
